hero.title: Support MSOE Baja Racing
hero.subtitle: Your donation helps us compete and innovate

sections.heading: Why Donate?
sections.content: MSOE Baja Racing is a student-led organization that designs, builds, and races off-road vehicles. Your generous donations help us purchase materials, tools, and equipment needed to compete at the highest level in SAE Baja competitions.

sections.heading: How Your Donation Helps
items: Materials and parts for vehicle construction

sections.heading: Make a Donation
sections.content: To make a tax-deductible donation to MSOE Baja Racing, please contact the MSOE Development Office or reach out to our team directly.

sections.heading: Other Ways to Support
sections.content: If you're unable to make a monetary donation, consider becoming a sponsor or helping us spread the word about our program. Every bit of support makes a difference!
